snippet: Credit Suisse has hired Chris Gaertner from Bank of America Merrill Lynch as a high-ranking technology banker, the firm said in a memo obtained by DealBook.
abstract: Credit Suisse has hired Chris Gaertner from Bank of America Merrill Lynch as a high-ranking technology banker, the firm said in a memo obtained by DealBook.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Credit Suisse Hires Veteran Tech Banker From Merrill
